DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the safety,tolerability and antiviral activitity of ALN-RSV01 in RSV infected lung transplant patients
DOC.brief_title: Phase 2 Study of ALN-RSV01 in Lung Transplant Patients Infected With Respiratory Syncytial Virus (RSV)
DOC.criteria: Single or bilateral lung transplant recipients Confirmed RSV infection Greater than 90 days post current lung transplant Rejection free for a minimum of 1 month Antimicrobial therapy for known viral, bacterial, or fungal respiratory coinfection at the time of diagnosis Bronchiolitis obliterans syndrome (BOS) Grade 3 or any state BOS with FEV1 that has not been stable for at least 3 months Use of alemtuzumab within 9 months prior to screening; antithymocyte globulin(ATG) or thymoglobulin within 3 months of screening: concurrent use of >= 0.3 mg/kg/day prednisone or equivalent as maintenance therapy active treament for acute graft rejection
